description: You can't drag and drop files into the application window, and the search feature seems limited. It also can open a link and has no back button, so if you want to go back to the original document you have to open another instance. It doesn't show up on the "open with" menu for *.md files.
This doesn't show up as an option for opening .md files, you have to first manually open the app and find your file within the app using a non-standard Open dialog.
Nothing displays when you open a file.
